title: For anyone who was wondering how bullshit "True Stealth" is...
body: It means Akali can freely walk around the enemies fountain with her new stealth, now you know why people are bitching and complaining.

replies.body:
And?

If she attacks, she gets revealed, and things will still connect with her even if she restealths in time. It’s not like she can just permanently stand under a tower and never worry about it hitting her if she’s attacking.

Core game stays the same but the method in which it is played changes drastically.  
This is part of why assassins such as Evelynn, Zed, and others do not see the same level of effectiveness at higher levels of play compared to lower. It is why the communitycomplains whenever Zed or an assassin is buffed.  They do not see that the buffs are meant to help champions who genuinely are having difficulties and encounter viability issues.
You balance around the highest level of play because attempting to balance around the lowest levels of play is beyond difficult at best.

Midlane kat vs akali

how is this a bad thing exactly? she can't do anything in said fountain. because if she does, she gets zapped and deleted.
The very meta-relevant fountaindive is here.{{sticker:cass-cry}}

http://i.imgur.com/DpQ9YJl.png

It's called "Obscured".
My fault, I wasn't aware of the technical term being used.
Ok but you right tho. She's literally able to walk casually into a turret without a wave and not be targetted by the turret at all.
Well the term "Obscured" means "keep from being seen; conceal.", so it fits. But yeah, the ability is complete and utter bullshit and needs to be reworked AGAIN.
Except... of course... the second she tries to attack you, she procs the fountain aggro and dies instantly... yep... pretty OP...

The reason the fountain thing is so dumb, is they punished other champions for being able to sit in your fountain in the past (without Zhonyas). 

For example, {{champion:24}} originally could sit in your fountain and dodged 100% of the shots from the fountain. He could still use all his abilities, summoner spells, and item actives.

Wow, that sounds like the least useful thing one could do with the ability.

If the argument that an ability is broken is trying to be justified with the fact that "it helps you dive fountain", then I don't think the person arguing the point realizes what makes a good or even broken ability.

I'm pretty sure she would still get zapped by the fountain lazer -.-
just because basic turrets are blinded doesn't mean the fountain one is. It is the turret that tends to ignore abilities after all.

Walking in a fountain for all of 5 seconds is nothing new.

I don't see what walking under the fountain will do if she gets insta kill by it when she wants to harm me ? Play a skillshot champ against her, when she dives with her shroud use your spell and it them, you can still see her, you just can't target her and don't get me with the "But if I'm not a skillshot champ ?" just don't got near her, there is a class of characters literally build for diving, their call divers, how cool is it ? Since a long time tower dives are pretty easy to do, it's not Akali the problem, towers should just be more meaningful, Akali is just one of many champion that can abuse it, like everything in this game you need to play around it. Stop bitching for one minute, that's why nobody goes to the boards, their's only whinning and complains without thinking first if there is a counter play to it. People hate it when the counter play is walk away but most champion got that, it's their thing, to make you walk away or outplay.
